import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react" import axios from "axios" import {Link} from "@reach/router" const productStyle = { height: "200px", width: "210px", backgroundColor: "red", display: "inline-block", marginRight: "15px", marginBottom: "15px" } const buttonStyle = { marginRight: "1035px", marginBottom: "25px" } const ProductList = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:8000/product-list/") .then((res) => setProducts(res.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) console.log(products) }, []) return (

Product List

{products.map((product) => ( //Going to remove this styling portion, this is for show

Name: {product.name}

Description: {product.desc}

Category: {product.atype}

Price: {product.price}

Quantity: {product.quantity}

Rating: {product.rating}

))} {/*
Box1
Box2
Box3
Box4
Box5
Box6
Box7
Box8
Box9
Box10
Box11
Box12
Box13
*/}
) } export default ProductList
